scenario_text.value: Ah, Saki! I finally found you!

I was looking all over for you, thank
goodness!
Hold up, there’s two Floramon?!
Careful now, that one’s a fake!

She’s lying, Saki! I’m the real one, you’ve
gotta believe me!

Oh jeez, I can’t tell the difference! Which
is the real one?!
Can you tell, Takuma?
Hmm, let’s see...

(Just like with Aoi, maybe talking to them
will help her figure it out.)
(The real Floramon would...)
Forgive secrets.
Go along with Saki.
Know her friendships.
I don’t know.

The fake Floramon scolded you for having
secrets. The real one wouldn’t do that!
Yeah, you’re right! In that case...

Hey, Floramon. Do you think friends shouldn’t
hide secrets from each other?

Hmm, everyone has a thing or two they can’t
talk about, don’t they?

Come on, Saki, you can’t call them real
friends if you hide stuff from them!
Well, well, that clears it up.

The real Floramon wouldn’t think of Saki as
selfish. Why not test that out?
Oh, you’re right! Let’s go with that!

Hey, Floramon. I’m bored of this already.
Let’s go home!

Hold on a minute! That’s too selfish!
Everyone else is still here, you know!

Come on, Saki, you can’t fool me! You’re
trying to help out in secret? I’ll join you!

Yeah, I figured the real Floramon would see
through me.

The real one knows how close you are to Aoi,
right?

Oh, that’s true! We’re always hanging out
together before we sleep in the music room.
Got it! In that case...

Hey, Floramon. Me and Aoi are like oil and
water, don’t you think?

Yeah, you guys are just too different. I bet
you two will never be friends.

What’re you saying? You two chat for ages
before you sleep. Like two peas in a pod.

Eheheh, that’s Floramon for you. You know us
through and through.
Sorry, I really don’t know.

Hmm, I see... Then I’ll just leave it up to
chance.
(The real Floramon is...)
On the right!
On the left!
Hee hee, what an idiot...
Oh no! The gas is getting thicker...
(This is bad. My consciousness is fading...)
This one!

When you’re right, you’re right! Good one,
Saki!
Hmph...
So that’s your true face—Seadramon!

Damn, if it’s come to this, I’ll have to use
force!
We’re up to bat, Agumon!
Yeah!
We’re going, too!
You bet, Aoi!

I’ll throw the pain of being tricked right
back in your face!
I’ll help you out, Saki!
